# DockAccessory.FramingMode.automatic

**Case**

Automatically frame the subject.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Defining the framing mode

- **DockAccessory.FramingMode.center**: Frame the subject in the center of the frame.
- **DockAccessory.FramingMode.left**: Frame the subject in the left side of the frame.
- **DockAccessory.FramingMode.right**: Frame the subject in the right side of the frame.
